about_the_game:
Oh no!!

Your sweet and caring grandmama has been kidnapped by the villain "Heimgartner" and his group of thugs! It falls upon your shoulders, as the young golem "Linden", to go in pursuit and brave a plethora of labyrinthine dungeons to set things right again!

- How can a golem have a grandmother?

- Who are these villains and why are they doing such terrible things?

- And what is the story with that quirky floating skull following you, called "Murray"?

All will be revealed in the full game.

Features

  • Classic Zelda-like gameplay with fresh surprises

  • A big assortment of large and varied dungeons

  • Non-linear level and world design, ripe for sequence breaking

  • A gripping story with twists and turns

  • Secrets hidden everywhere!

  • Modern conveniences like auto-saves and button remapping

  • Murray!! (You'll all love him instantly, or so he keeps confidently proclaiming)


WISHLIST NOW to discover a brand new world of secrets and adventure!

-------------------------------------

UPDATE 26-01-2025:
It was a good development weekend: we finished three more area tracks and the last of the character items.

short_description: Come explore this world of secrets and adventure. Featuring solid 2D Zelda-like gameplay, 12 vast non-linear dungeons and a wholesome story about the young golem protagonist called Linden.
